entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 11
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 14
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 9 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT
